issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Reenable physical_optimizer::repartition::Repartition;
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12427](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12427). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To fix https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12421

We disabled the physical_optimizer::repartition::Repartition rule in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10069


this ticket tracks finding the root cause of the CI test failure and reenabing physical_optimizer::repartition::Repartition;
